Module KernelGeneratorExt

Methods

comment   eval   generate   if   merge   unless  

Public Instance methods

comment(message)

Writes out a comment with the given message. 

 comment 'this code is awesome!' #=> '/* this code is awesome! */'

[Source]

    # File slices/eschaton_kernel/kernel_generator_ext.rb, line 11
11:   def comment(message)
12:     self << "/* #{message} */"
13:   end
eval(script)

Evaluates the script as javascript on the client.

[Source]

   # File slices/eschaton_kernel/kernel_generator_ext.rb, line 4
4:   def eval(script)
5:     self << "eval(#{script.to_js});"
6:   end
generate(options = {})

Returns script that has been generated and allows for addtional options regarding generation than the default to_s method.

Options:

  • error_wrapping - Optional. Indicates if the script should be wrapped in try..catch blocks, defaulted to false.
  • strip_each_line - Optional. Indicates if leading and trailing whitespace should be stripped from each line, defaulted to true.
  • inline - Optional. Indicates if new lines should be stripped from the generated script, defaulted to false.

[Source]

    # File slices/eschaton_kernel/kernel_generator_ext.rb, line 54
54:   def generate(options = {})
55:     options.default! :error_wrapping => false, :strip_each_line => true, :inline => false
56:     options.assert_valid_keys :error_wrapping, :strip_each_line, :inline,
57:     
58:     reset_rjs_debug = ActionView::Base.debug_rjs
59:     
60:     ActionView::Base.debug_rjs = options[:error_wrapping]
61:     
62:     output = self.to_s
63: 
64:     output.strip_each_line! if options[:strip_each_line]
65:     output.gsub!("\n", ' ') if options[:inline]
66: 
67:     ActionView::Base.debug_rjs = reset_rjs_debug
68:     
69:     output
70:   end
if(condition) {|self| ...}

Writes out a javascript "if" statement using the given condition. Any code generated within the block will be placed inside the "if" statement. 

 ==== Examples:

 script.if("x == 1") do
   script.alert("x is 1!")
 end

[Source]

    # File slices/eschaton_kernel/kernel_generator_ext.rb, line 23
23:   def if(condition)
24:     self << "if(#{condition}){"
25:     yield self
26:     self << "}"
27:   end
merge(other_generator, options = {})

Merges the content of other_generator with this generator. The given options are the same as supported by generate.

[Source]

    # File slices/eschaton_kernel/kernel_generator_ext.rb, line 44
44:   def merge(other_generator, options = {})
45:     self << other_generator.generate(options)
46:   end
unless(condition) {|self| ...}

Writes out a javascript "unless" statement using the given condition. Any code generated within the block will be placed inside the "unless" statement. 

 ==== Examples:

 script.unless("x == 1") do
   script.alert("x is not 1!")
 end

[Source]

    # File slices/eschaton_kernel/kernel_generator_ext.rb, line 37
37:   def unless(condition)
38:     self << "if(!(#{condition})){"
39:     yield self
40:     self << "}"
41:   end

[Validate]
